display.title: Doom: Buenos A(iii)res
display.description: Devconnect is drawing the whole web3 crew to Buenos Aires, but a Halloween glitch (“Entropy Leak”) is turning attendees into voxel statues—more pixelated every minute. You must collect Anti-Entropy Shards to stabilize your avatar, fix the Buenos A(iii)res Beacon, and open a portal to Devconnect. Fail, and you’re frozen… FOR-E-VA 👻
